SELECT t1.event_id, t1.event_name, t1.is_show_nbr, t2.fee_id, TRUNCATE (t2.fee / ${money_rate}, 4) AS fee FROM ( SELECT e.event_id, e.event_name, 1 AS is_show_nbr FROM tb_bill_event_type e WHERE e.event_id NOT IN (${event_id_1001}, ${event_id_1002}, ${event_id_1016}) UNION ALL SELECT e.event_id, concat(e.event_name, '(隐号)') AS event_name, 0 AS is_show_nbr FROM tb_bill_event_type e WHERE e.event_id IN (${event_id_1001}, ${event_id_1002}, ${event_id_1016}) UNION ALL SELECT e.event_id, concat(e.event_name, '(显号)') AS event_name, 1 AS is_show_nbr FROM tb_bill_event_type e WHERE e.event_id = ${event_id_1016} UNION ALL SELECT e.event_id, concat( e.event_name, '(单显官方号码)' ) AS event_name, 1 AS is_show_nbr FROM tb_bill_event_type e WHERE e.event_id IN (${event_id_1001}, ${event_id_1002}) UNION ALL SELECT e.event_id, concat( e.event_name, '(单显手机号)' ) AS event_name, 2 AS is_show_nbr FROM tb_bill_event_type e WHERE e.event_id IN (${event_id_1001}, ${event_id_1002}) ) t1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT i.fee_id, i.fee, i.is_show_nbr FROM tb_bill_fee_item i, tb_bill_fee_item_rel ir WHERE i.fee_id = ir.fee_id AND ir.package_id = #{package_id} ) t2 ON t2.fee_id LIKE concat(t1.event_id, '%') AND t2.is_show_nbr = t1.is_show_nbr ORDER BY t1.event_id, t1.is_show_nbr DESC
